text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: tense confrontation, emotional turmoil>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: “We must go together on this road!”

Sonia: “What for? What’s all this for?”

Raskolnikov: “You can’t remain like this, that’s why!”

---

<setup: desperation, chaotic thoughts>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Sonia: “What’s to be done? What’s to be done?”

Raskolnikov: “Break what must be broken, once for all.”

Sonia: “I don’t understand! Help me!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov urges Sonia to confront harsh realities and take decisive action for their future, emphasizing the need for power and freedom.
